detaileddescription.para: Because each BAP Handler acting as Active Participant is working in the same way and only difference is the data to handle and functions to call, the most flexible and easy to maintenance solution was chosen. Single BAPHandler_ATN module was designed to provide couple functions which allow each BAPHandler to act as Active Participant in communication with OCU. In practice is not a module but rather a library providing Active Participant functionality. Creating separate ATN module for each BAPHandler was considered and discarded as more prone to errors and more difficult to maintain.
